attributes.action: ensure HM THE QUEEN who the old soldiers want to see is present at the D DAY ANNIVERSARY and you who nobody wants to see stays home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tHE QUEEN HAS EARNED THE RESPECTOF THE PEOPLE BY HER ACTIONS DURING THE WAR AND SHE SHOULD DEFINITELY BE AT D-DAY ANNIVERSARY MORE SO THAN PEOPLE NOT EVEN BORN THEN

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
